lead_paragraph: Harvard won the 141st Harvard-Yale Regatta for the seventh year in a row yesterday on the Thames River in New London, Conn. The Crimson finished the four-mile men's heavyweight crew race in 23 minutes 22.6 seconds. Yale finished two boat lengths behind in 23:30.4. Harvard has won 20 of the last 22 regattas, extending its dominance in the nation's oldest intercollegiate athletic competition. The Crimson leads the series, 88-53.
